after.description: Keep entities having date greater than

before.description: Keep entities having date less than

checksum.description: Checksum of the file represented by this dto.

downloadUrl.description: downloadUrl of the file represented by this dto.

filename.description: Name of the file represented by this dto.

filesize.description: Size of the file represented by this dto.

id.description: Identifier of the file represented by this dto.

productId.description: providerId of the product containing this file.

ignoreCase.description: Only available for String resitrctions. Allow if true, to search values ignoring case. Default false

matchMode.description: Match mode to use, can be STRICT|STARTS_WITH|CONTAINS|ENDS_WITH (default STRICT)

values.description: List of accepted or refused values (according to the mode)

items.description: List of accepted or refused values (according to the mode)

409.description: Number of selected products in the basket exceeds the maximum number allowed

post.summary: Add a selection to the basket of current user

post.description: Add a selection to the basket of current user from a file, which contains a product identifier per line.

409.description: Number of selected products in the basket exceeds the maximum number allowed

post.summary: Add a selection to the basket of current user from a file

get.description: Return files corresponding to the orderId input, if exists and user has access to it

200.description: The order has been successfully retrieved.

204.description: The order has been successfully retrieved, but no file is available.

206.description: The order has been successfully retrieved, but is not finished

403.description: Order is not accessible for the current user.

get.summary: Get files available in specific order

get.description: Return files corresponding to the orderId and filesTaskId input, if exists and user has access to it

200.description: The suborder has been successfully retrieved.

204.description: The suborder has been successfully retrieved, but no file is available.

206.description: The suborder has been successfully retrieved, but is not finished

403.description: Suborder is not accessible for the current user.

get.summary: Get files available in specific suborder

200.description: The order was successfully initiated. Returns OrderRequestResponseDtoEvent with the createdOrderId.

400.description: The order could not be created. Refer to the response returned for more information.

403.description: The endpoint is not accessible for the user.

422.description: The submission request dto syntax is incorrect.

post.summary: Create an order automatically from a OrderRequestDto.

get.description: Return order corresponding to the orderId input, if exists and user has access to it

200.description: The order has been successfully retrieved.

403.description: Order is not accessible for the current user.
